description:
My place is a spacious, very clean  and quiet  1 BR steps to Central Park, Restaurants, Shops, Museums, Subway.  Amenities include temper-pedic bed, wifi, closet space, cable tv, elevator. You'll love it for the cleanliness, space, Central Park, Subway, feels like home. Ideal for couples, individuals and business travelers.

Extra high ceiling. Space, space, space. Steps to both subway and park. Quiet.

Wifi, closet, elevator, full use of kitchen, TV, cable.

Central Park, easy access to anywhere on city through subway and cross town bus, restaurants, shops.

VERY!
name: Very spacious, comfortable UWS 1 br
review: Great apartment, great location, great hosts.
